meanings.definition: A sound or exclamation of disgust.
meanings.sent1: He let out an ewks when he saw the creepy crawly bug.
meanings.sent2: The ewks from the crowd showed their disapproval.

meanings.definition: To cause someone to feel disgusted or repulsed.
meanings.sent1: The gross food ewksed her and she couldn't eat it.
